title: Thresh lantern (W) range bugged?
body: When I'm playing Thresh and I throw my lantern I can see the range as I throw it out but it only shows for a second and the range disappears. Kinda annoying when trying to throw a lantern and don't know the range that I can stand without my allies taking my lantern. Is anyone else getting this?

replies.body:
Hey tar ar ais deo,

Can you try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article) and see if the problem persists afterwards?

Just repaired my client and went into custom games to check. Still bugged. The range of the lantern will flash for a second every two seconds. As I'm about to step out of the range it will flash again for a second. So weird.
